description:
TORONTO!!!  Join us for our second annual Holiday Special 🎅🏽

Saturday December 9th, 2017
The Rivoli
Toronto, ON
LOTS of special guests joining us including Stacey Kay, Conor Gains, Yoko Gold and more
Danielle Ponder & The Tomorrow People. (Rochester, NY) kick things off
Tix:  $12 adv, $20 dos

Holiday food + toy drive details coming soon!
name: 2nd Annual After Funk Holiday Special
